section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on October 25, 2023.*
section.heading: Parties.
section.text: Parties to a guardianship proceeding shall be the vulnerable youth, the proposed guardian, and the vulnerable youth’s parents. The court may, at its discretion, on its own motion, or in response to a motion for joinder or intervention, join additional parties to a guardianship proceeding.

codify:insert.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on October 25, 2023.*

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 16-2399.03 of Vulnerable Youth Guardianship Protection Emergency Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Act 25-203, Aug. 1, 2023, 70 DCR 10758).
